statements: UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 20 WHERE part_id = 1;

UPDATE accessories SET acc_description = 'Updated description', acc_price = 19.99, acc_quantity = acc_quantity + 5 WHERE acc_id = 5;
UPDATE parts SET quantity = 20 WHERE part_id = 1;
UPDATE maintenance_logs SET maintenance_date = '2022-10-15', maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' WHERE log_id = 100;

UPDATE accessories SET price=24.99, compatible_parts='101,102' WHERE accessory_id=201;

UPDATE drone_parts SET price = 1500.00, quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE part_category = 'Motors';
UPDATE drones SET purchase_date = '2022-04-01', drone_model = 'Advanced Model X' WHERE drone_id = 101;

UPDATE drone_accessories SET price = 9.99, quantity = 100 WHERE accessory_id = 201;
UPDATE drone_parts SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE part_id = 101;
UPDATE drone_accessories SET price = price * 1.1, quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE accessory_id = 201;
